name: Necro Druid
description:
As an undead druid, escape a dead forest using your powers.

Necro Druid has an ability to revive plants. However, due to his undead nature, he can heal only one plant at the same time, and the others will wither away when he doesn't focus on them. Using this power you have to make your way through the levels.

Controls:

  • A / Left Arrow - move left,
  • D / Right Arrow - move right,
  • W / Up Arrow / Space - jump,
  • Left Mouse Button - heal plants,
  • ESC / TAB - pause.

Necro Druid was made in 12 days as a part of My First Game Jam: Summer 2022. The theme of the jam was Heal.
